\documentclass[a4paper]{article}
\usepackage{pst-geo}
\usepackage{geometry}%
\pagestyle{empty}

\begin{document}

\psset{path=../data}
\begin{pspicture*}(-18,-85)(-4,-75)
\psset{unit=8,type=8,latitude0=13.28,longitude0=52.5,level=50,Europe}
\WorldMapII[maillage=false,linewidth=0.5pt,limiteL=190,borders]
\end{pspicture*}

\begin{verbatim}
\psset{path=../data}
\begin{pspicture*}(-18,-85)(-4,-75)
\psset{unit=8,type=8,latitude0=13.28,longitude0=52.5,level=50,Europe}
\WorldMapII[maillage=false,linewidth=0.5pt,limiteL=190,borders]
\end{pspicture*}
\end{verbatim}


\end{document}
